sentences.sContent: My life was supposed to go like this: get married in my early twenties to another Mormon in a Mormon temple, have children, raise them, marry them off, become a grandmother and die.
sentences.sCn: 我的生活轨迹本应该像这样：在二十出头和另一位摩门教徒在摩门教堂宣布结婚，生几个孩子，养大他们，一直到他们嫁娶出门，我成为奶奶外婆，然后死去。

sentences.sContent: We’re getting married (= marrying ) next month.
